text: Micoud is a Quarter on the Caribbean island nation of Saint Lucia, and also a village inside that Quarter. According to the 2002 census, the population of the Quarter was 16,143 people. The village of Micoud is located at . ==Notable people== *Sesenne (1914-2010), singer and cultural icon * Daren Sammy, West Indies Cricket == References == ==Adjacent quarters== Category:Quarters of Saint Lucia
title: Micoud Quarter
